bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with zhang qi 瘴氣 , miasmatic qi

①. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hu 葫 , LSZ: 攜 之旅途，則炎風瘴雨不能加 , “If one takes it along when travelling, one cannot be affected by fiery wind and miasmatic rain ”. Zhang zhong 脹重 , distension and heaviness [1]

Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of an extreme distension. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qian niu zi 牽牛子 LSZ: 治水氣在肺，喘滿腫脹，下焦鬱遏，腰背脹重 , “It cures the presence of water qi in the lung, panting and a feeling of fullness, swelling anddistension. Pent-up and restrained [qi] in the lower burner. The lumbar region and the back feel distension and heaviness ”.
